    public class UniversalBucket
extends net.minecraft.item.Item
    A universal bucket that can hold any liquid

    • 构造器详细资料

      • UniversalBucket

        public UniversalBucket()

      • UniversalBucket

        public UniversalBucket​(int capacity,
                       @Nonnull
                       net.minecraft.item.ItemStack empty,
                       boolean nbtSensitive)
        参数:
        capacity - Capacity of the container
        empty - Item used for filling with the bucket event and returned when emptied
        nbtSensitive - Whether the empty item is NBT sensitive (usually true if empty and full are the same items)
